delta:
I can do that. Before I take any action I need to confirm a few things and get your explicit approval.

Please tell me:
1) Exactly what you want deleted (file/folder names, database/tables, account, etc.).  
2) Where it is located (device, OS, cloud provider and account, path).  
3) Whether you have a backup or want one created first.  
4) Whether you want a normal delete (recycle/trash) or a secure/irreversible wipe.  
5) When to perform the deletion (immediately or scheduled).

Warning: secure deletion is usually irreversible and may prevent any data recovery. I will not run or suggest deletion commands until you explicitly approve.

If you want me to proceed now, confirm by replying with this exact phrase (so I know you approve):  
YES — permanently delete the items listed above

After you provide the details and that explicit confirmation phrase, I will give the exact steps/commands and a final short checklist before you execute them.
